home.title: Browser-first utilities for developers and creators
home.subtitle: Fast, privacy-friendly tools that run in your browser. No uploads required.
home.localOnly: All processing happens locally in your browser.
home.categoriesSubtitle: Pick a workflow and stay in the browser.

base64.name: Base64 Converter
base64.description: Encode and decode text locally in your browser.

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter & Validator
json-formatter.description: Validate and pretty-print JSON without leaving the browser.

word-counter.name: Word Counter
word-counter.description: Count words, characters, and lines instantly.

case-converter.name: Case Converter
case-converter.description: Convert text between upper, lower, camelCase, and snake_case.

diff-checker.name: Diff Checker
diff-checker.description: Compare two texts and highlight differences.

lorem-ipsum.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
lorem-ipsum.description: Generate placeholder text on the fly.

markdown-preview.name: Markdown Preview
markdown-preview.description: Preview Markdown with GitHub-flavored markdown support.

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.description: Generate strong local passwords with custom length and symbols.

uuid-generator.name: UUID Generator
uuid-generator.description: Create UUID v4 strings with Web Crypto in your browser.

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Compute MD5, SHA-256, and SHA-512 locally in your browser.

qr-generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr-generator.description: Create QR codes locally from text or URLs.

exif-viewer.name: EXIF Viewer
exif-viewer.description: Inspect photo metadata (camera, time) in your browser.

color-converter.name: Color Converter
color-converter.description: Convert between HEX and RGB on the fly.

image-to-pdf.name: Image to PDF
image-to-pdf.description: Reorder images and export them as a single PDF.

list-dedup-sort.name: List Deduplicator & Sorter
list-dedup-sort.description: Remove duplicates with optional ascending or descending order.

csv-json-converter.name: CSV ↔ JSON Converter
csv-json-converter.description: Flip data between CSV and JSON using PapaParse.

random-picker.name: Random Picker & Groups
random-picker.description: Draw winners or split names into random teams.

image-compressor.name: Image Compressor
image-compressor.description: Compress images via Canvas/Web Workers without uploads.

image-converter.name: Image Format Converter
image-converter.description: Turn JPG/PNG/WebP files into another format instantly.

social-mockup.name: Social Media Mockup
social-mockup.description: Generate Tweet/Instagram style cards and download screenshots.

palette-generator.name: Palette & Gradient Generator
palette-generator.description: Generate random palettes and CSS gradients with one click.

svg-recolor.name: SVG Recolor
svg-recolor.description: Upload an SVG icon and recolor fills/strokes client-side.

emoji-cleaner.name: Emoji Cleaner
emoji-cleaner.description: Remove or extract emojis from any text block.

social-formatter.name: Social Caption Formatter
social-formatter.description: Add spacing, bullets, and emoji flourishes for IG/Xiaohongshu posts.

advanced-word-count.name: Advanced Word Count
advanced-word-count.description: Track characters, sentences, and paragraphs in real time.

date-calculator.name: Date Calculator
date-calculator.description: Measure the distance between two dates in days, weeks, and months.

finance-calculator.name: Compound Interest Planner
finance-calculator.description: Project savings growth with charts for contributions vs. gains.

bmi-calculator.name: BMI Calculator
bmi-calculator.description: Input height/weight to view BMI and a quick health tip.

unit-converter.name: Unit & Size Converter
unit-converter.description: Convert length, weight, shoe size, and clothing charts.

international-temperature-converter.name: International Temperature Unit Converter
international-temperature-converter.description: Convert Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin, and Rankine for global workflows.

family-relation-calculator.name: Family Relation Calculator
family-relation-calculator.description: Map Chinese family titles by selecting yourself and the relative steps.

lunar-new-year-essentials.name: New Year Essentials
lunar-new-year-essentials.description: Countdowns, greetings, and prep lists for Lunar New Year gatherings.

finance-number-case-converter.name: Financial Uppercase Converter
finance-number-case-converter.description: Turn RMB amounts into uppercase financial text instantly.

finance-essentials.name: Finance Toolkit
finance-essentials.description: Handy calculators for invoices, reimbursements, and per-diem splits.

base-converter.name: Base Converter
base-converter.description: Convert numbers between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal.

computer-base-converter.name: Computer Base Converter
computer-base-converter.description: Developer-focused radix converter with bit-length hints.

video-to-gif.name: Video to GIF (WASM)
video-to-gif.description: Use ffmpeg.wasm to clip and export GIFs entirely in-browser.

ocr.name: OCR (Tesseract.js)
ocr.description: Recognize English or Chinese text from an image locally.
